== Description ==
Order the pages with children under parents in a flat list. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php get_page_hierarchy( $posts, $parent ) ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$posts|array|Posts array.}}
{{Parameter|$parent|integer|Parent page ID.|optional|0}}

== Return Values ==
; (array) : A list arranged by hierarchy. Children immediately follow their parents.
